Package fr.ecp.Group52_Project_IS1220_part1_AVEROUS_TOPUZ.Exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadCoordinatesSyntaxException
    An exception to handle bad syntax when inputting GPS coordinates as String in DMS format.
    EmptySlotException
    An exception to handle cases in which a User would try to pick up a bike from an empty parking slot.
    InvalidCoordinatesException
    An exception to handle cases, in which minutes or seconds for gps coordinates have been entered with negative values, which makes no sense.
    InvalidProportionsException
    An exception to handle cases in which the proportions are superior to 100% when creating a new station.
    InvalidSyntaxException
    An exception to handle invalid syntax in CLUI
    MoreBikesThanSlotsException
    An exception to handle cases in which it is asked to create more bikes than there are available slots at a station.
    NoAvailableBikeException
    An exception to handle cases in which a User would try to pick up a bike at a station in which there are no available bikes.
    NoFreeSlotException
    An exception to handle cases in which a User would try to drop off a bike at a station in which there are no free parking slots.
    NoRideException
    An exception to handle cases in which we want to access the ride of a user while he isn't on a ride.
    NoSuchNetworkException
    An exception to handle cases in which someone searches for a Network using its name or id, but no Network with the given parameters exists the system.
    NoSuchStationException
    An exception to handle cases in which someone searches for a Station using its stationID, but no station with the given ID exists in the Network.
    NoSuchUserException
    An exception to handle cases in which someone searches for a User using his userID, but no user with the given ID exists in the Network.
    OccupiedSlotException
    An exception to handle cases in which a User would try to drop off a bike at an occupied parking slot.
    OutOfBoundsException
    An exception to handle cases in which a User inputs Coordinates into a GPScoordinates object, that are out of bounds.
